description:
Oregon Caves National Monument. Tours are run by the National Park Service. Cave tours are available late March through early November. As of 2017:

  • Discovery Cave Tour: $10/person. 90min.
  • Candlelight Cave Tour: $10/person. 60min.
  • Off-trail Caving Tour: $45/person. Offered only during the summer.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

If you want to get into serious cave exploration, join some experienced local caving group (sometimes called 'grotto's).

Beta sites

  • Oregon Caves National Monument

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Oregon Caves
